verses.roman:
ei-mata mahāprabhu bhramite bhramite
āiṭoṭā haite samudra dekhena ācambite

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; bhramite bhramite—while wandering; āiṭoṭā haite—from the temple of Āiṭoṭā; samudra—the sea; dekhena—sees; ācambite—suddenly.
translation: While thus wandering near the temple of Āiṭoṭā, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu suddenly saw the sea.
